import React from 'react'; import { Card } from '@mui/material'; const UserCard = (props) => { return (

{props.name}

@{props.userName}

Repos

{props.repos}

Followers

{props.followers}

Following

{props.following}

{props.email ? props.email : 'Not Available'}

{props.company ? props.company : 'Not Available'}

 ) } export default UserCard; /*{ data.length === 0 ? '' :<> {data.login} {data.name} }*/
